sentences.sContent: The two chief function of any air-conditioning system are the regulation of air temperature and humidity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The two chief function of any air-conditioning system are the regulation of air temperature and humidity.
sentences.sCn: 任何空气调节系统的两大主要功能，就是调节空气的温度和湿度。

sentences.sContent: The intention and Standard of the cleanout and disinfection operation of central air-conditioning system isdescribed in this paper.
sentences.sContent_eng: The intention and Standard of the cleanout and disinfection operation of central air-conditioning system isdescribed in this paper.
sentences.sCn: 本文主要介绍了中央空调系统中清洗、消毒工程的目的、要求、标准、规程、步骤、方法等。

sentences.sContent: In underground water source heating pump air-conditioning system of one guesthouse project, the heating pump unit does not always run at full load status.
sentences.sContent_eng: In underground water source heating pump air-conditioning system of one guesthouse project, the heating pump unit does not always run at full load status.
sentences.sCn: 某宾馆工程地下水源热泵空调系统中，热泵机组在实际运行中不总处于满负荷运行状态。

remMethod.val: air(空气) ＋ conditioning(调节) → 空调设备

trans.tranCn: 空调设备， 空调系统
trans.tranOther: Air-conditioning is a method of providing buildings and vehicles with cool dry air
